root: ^Ezra: Hello??... Earth to (name). Are you okay??
^Player: Huh… uh yeah, I’m okay. Just got lost in my own thoughts
^Ezra: Are you sure, you seem so distant after the doctor ruled you out for the rest of your basketball season.
^It’s probably just the meds, I just came out of surgery

Surgery: ^You both laugh and the room goes silent for a while
Fine: ^Ezra: Alright. Listen I know we’ve been distant ever since I left for university, but I want you to know that you can talk to me.
^The room goes silent for a while until Ethan breaks the silence.
Continue: ^Ezra: So, have you spoken to mom yet?
^Player: No, she said she’d call once her flight lands. I don’t want to bother her too much.
^Ezra: Totally understandable. Just give her time. Well, I’m off to go do some catch up on some schoolwork.
^Ezra begins to walk out the room…
^Thanks for picking me up from the hospital today.
NoProblem: ^Ezra: That’s what big brothers are for. I’ve always got your back.
Yeah: ^Player (to self): Should I tell him. What if he thinks I’m weak, how do I find the words to express how I really feel? Maybe I’m overthinking this.
^	Uhhh…I just wanted to say thank you for the pep talk. It’s something I really needed.
Confess: ^Player: Uhhmm… I need some advice. I haven’t been handling this well. It hasn’t been easy asking for help.

^Ezra: I’m hear for you whatever you need. Asking for help doesn’t mean you’re weak, I know your competitive nature does that to you. I’m going to be here for you emotionally and physically if needed.
^You slightly smile looking at your older brother as they give you words of encouragement.
ContinueStory: ^You follow and head up to your room.
